about.title: Introduction
about.subTitle: Overview.
about.content: Hi there! I'm a Python Developer with experience in frameworks like FastAPI and Flask. My skill set also extends to web scraping with Scrapy, data analysis with Pandas, and big data processing with PySpark. I'm beginner in React to create web interfaces with low-code components, aspiring to become a Full Stack Developer.Feel free to connect and discuss with me.

experience.title: What I have done so far
experience.subTitle: Work Experience.

0.title: Documentation Engineer
points: Python automation for file management and supplies calculation

1.title: Data Engineer
points: Backend design and development of application systems, including Django, Flask, Tornado

2.title: Senior Python Engineer
points: Backend RESTful API development for B2B products

3.title: APP Backend Engineer
points: Backend RestFul API development for Stocks community Application
Aws authentication and Sns notification and S3 storage management

work.title: MY WORK
work.subTitle: Projects.
work.content: Following projects showcases my skills and experience through real-world examples of my work. Each project is briefly described with links to code repositories and live demos in it. It reflects my ability to solve complex problems, work with different technologies, and manage projects effectively.

0.name: React Developer PortFolio
0.description: A modern personal portfolio built with React, Threejs, Framer Motion, and more. Can be used as a template for personal websites.

1.name: FastAPI Data Manage
1.description: A backend project developed using FastAPI, with MongoDB and JWT and includes a user system. Great for learning FastAPI or as a starter for new projects.

2.name: React Data Admin
2.description: A fronted project developed using React, with Typescript, Redux and Antd. It is the best practice to use React+hooks+antd.

blog.title: MY BLOGS
blog.subTitle: Blogs.
blog.content: My blog delves into meaningful problem-solving approaches, learning new technologies and languages, with a focus on databases, big data, and backend frameworks. Primarily centered around Python, the posts offer insightful examples and discussions. These articles serve as a resource for those interested in innovative solutions and the exploration of emerging tech trends in the programming world.

contact.sendSuccess: Thank you. I will get back to you as soon as possible.
